data.title: Divi Hosting By SiteGround
data.text:
What is Divi Hosting?

Divi Hosting is powerful WordPress Hosting plus automatic Divi installation and Divi-specific server tuning when applicable. All of our hosting partners have either adjusted their standard hosting environments to be Divi optimized or adjusted their Divi Hosting packages to meet all of Divi's requirements.. Your website is hosted with and supported by SiteGround, a host that we trust and have had great personal experience with. That's why we chose to partner with them! We helped create Divi Hosting so that we could have something that we know will work great with Divi out of the box.

Expand Menu Collapse Menu

Why choose Divi Hosting?

We have done the hard work for you and sought out one of the best WordPress hosts in the business. Next, we partnered with them to tailor their hosting packages to work best with Divi. Finally, we worked together to enable automatic Divi installation and license activation. To put it simply, Divi Hosting is fast, works great with Divi and is easier to get started with than normal WordPress Hosting. If you are a Divi user, it's a no-brainer.

Expand Menu Collapse Menu

What comes pre-installed on my website with Divi Hosting?

When you create your first new website using SiteGround's Divi Hosting, you will be greeted with a fully-functioning WordPress website with Divi pre-installed and configured with your Divi license key. No installation or initial setup required. You can jump right in and start building! Divi can be installed manually on unlimited additional websites.

Expand Menu Collapse Menu

Will my website be hosted by Elegant Themes?

No, your website will be hosted and supported by SiteGround. SiteGround is a leader in WordPress hosting and we partnered with them because we trust them to do a great job hosting your website!

Expand Menu Collapse Menu

Who do I contact for support if I have a question about my hosting?

All support is provided by SiteGround. They offer some of the best 24/7 WordPress hosting support around and we are confident that you will be happy with their service.

Expand Menu Collapse Menu
